title: Calories in Costco Cheese Pizza
meta_description: Discover calories in costco pizza cheese per slice, including macros like protein, carbs, fat, and nutrition tweaks for your food court slice.
assumptions: Standard Costco food court cheese pizza slice (1/8 of 18-inch whole pizza), with mozzarella cheese, tomato sauce, no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact preparation, slice size, cheese amount, and location; values based on averages. Check Costco for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One slice of Costco cheese pizza has about 710 kcal and 30 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of Costco cheese pizza?
What are the macros for Costco cheese pizza?
faqs.a: Per slice: 88 g carbs, 30 g protein, 30 g fat, 5 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is Costco cheese pizza high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1200 mg sodium per slice from cheese and sauce.

faqs.q: How does Costco pizza compare to other brands?
faqs.a: Costco slices are larger and often higher in calories (710 kcal) than standard 8-inch slices (200-300 kcal).

faqs.q: Calories in a whole Costco cheese pizza?
faqs.a: Around 5680 kcal for 8 slices; varies by exact size and baking.
